name: copytrade-pro
description: Professional trading application with multi-broker support

scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../e2e-tests && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist backend/public e2e-tests/test-results e2e-tests/playwright-report
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test

author: Raviteja Kamalapuram
